TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that has been studied in the treatment of cancer. It belongs to the families of drugs called angiogenesis inhibitors and tyrosine kinase inhibitors. Also called semaxanib.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia en estudio para el tratamiento del cáncer. Es un tipo de inhibidor de la angiogénesis y de inhibidor de tirosina–cinasas. También se llama semaxanib.
